title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: My country people, I de bring new month salutation give una from my end.As una know, our country don become officially 63 years old today and when I de reason am the thing de funny me on a normal. E get one proverb when our people de talk say "a fool at 40 is a fool forever" make God no allow this one become our portion oh. because we don pass 40 go front well well but nothing de to show say we be old nationThis kind independence when de like say we commot from frying pan enter fire!We gained independence from the white and got enslaved by our very own old parents - it's a shameAs a person, if you just de had age yet you no de grow, no development de reach your side and  you no de do anything new, how people go see you? But na wetin our country done become so oh.From today, tomorrow and some few days to come, our media go de field up with independent post after which everyone will go back to their silent mode. Na only God fit help us.The labours of our heroes past don de almost become in vain and the worst part be say no be the white wan make their efforts fruitless, na we ourselves de spoil the country for ourselves63 years of fruitlessness, God abeg o!

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on October 01, 2023, 05:47:13 AM63 years of fruitlessness, God abeg o! I no go entirely say na 63 years of fruitfullesness as op tok. If you luk Wella u go see say a lot has been achieved as a nation and people we're surviving no matter what. The problem we get na say dis current leaders in the past one decade na just make de country luk lik we no dey make progress again but one tin for sure we will pass dis phase. And Nigeria will be great again!Dis foto na for Whatsapp status I take and na mk inno get source to use, so d source de inside d FOTO.

comments.author: Salahmu
comments.body: Gone are days when independent was fully celebrated by everyone with great joy in there heart but now due to hardship and suffering the government has subjected us to, almost everybody has shown no concern about the independence today, our government is just like a step, when a present government is not doing well we wish the next government to be better than the past but when they enter, they become more worster than the one we were praying to leave so that's the circle the citizens are suffering but one thing is for sure Nigeria our home and no matter how a mother will beat a child at last the child always come back home because he or she has no other place to find a comfort but her home, so regardless we would always celebrate the independent.

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: Menhn e dey pain me say the Naija wey I know when I been dey small pickin don change to weytin I No know again like this I dey reason weytin I go tell my children when I finally get, everything wey dey happened now no funny, weytin we want celebrate when hunger dey ground, things hard many people don die out of hardship wey dey we country now. My dear OP the situation bitter I swear... no joy anywhere.

comments.author: Agbamoni
comments.body: Quote from: Timmzzy on October 01, 2023, 01:25:29 PMMenhn e dey pain me say the Naija wey I know when I been dey small pickin don change to weytin I No know again like this I dey reason weytin I go tell my children when I finally get, everything wey dey happened now no funny, weytin we want celebrate when hunger dey ground, things hard many people don die out of hardship wey dey we country now. My dear OP the situation bitter I swear... no joy anywhere. No be today the zeal die to. Our mind done they channeled on how to survive first before any other thing. Once you done grow to the extent wey be say life done show you peper for nigeria you go no say all these things no they move you again. The country done show us shege wey be say we know say the reason for the independence wey we suppose they happy for no they valid again. Me i forever respect and love my countri but e still they hard for meto sing our National Anthem now with pride.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: There is every reason to celebrate. I will highlight just a fewYou can still afford to have access to the internet. Meaning, there is not censorship. You have access to the outside world.We are still better than some other countries where civil war is ongoing. You have access to electricity, good water, and food.The youths of the country are becoming politically conscious, aware, and are challenging the status quo. There's more ways to earn money other than waiting on the government to create jobs or even private companies for employment.There is hope.

Which kind 63 fruitlessness be this, God abeg this independent was so damn this country con turn another thing, people no want gree celebrate there fathers land again, i wonder how this country take dey favor some people  to the the extent that they are celebrating the 63 independent, even for my side today person don kill  himself some injured all in the name of celebrating independent. Person weh never bellfull how him go take celebrate. This our country  don become something else, even people weh die today how him go tell Baba God say na independent him go celebrate weh him die, even for naija this independent they no take am seriousPerson no go get full evidence say u go fit keep for future childrens say this how our time of independent be, e just dey surprise me wetin dey jinja some people to even make them happy to even go and be celebrating what so called independent base on how this naija take be my peoples no get joy at all, as I dey like this nothing this country go celebrate weh go make me happy because na the same shege we dey face everyday, the country self con hard omo, see the poor people's every where, they should have been some changes poor people's are there suffering for what to eat, to eat and drink now is something else  we hoping our country should be better soon, even as this country dey our problem aren't the same, students no suppose dey broke for school, government dey make us see plenty shege weh our mouth no go fit talk again, I just believe say we go survive am one day.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: It is in great disbelief that Nigeria is at 63 and we are still crawling like a newborn country that has no direction or purpose by her mothers. Em d very heartbreaking sae our leaders can't boldly boost of how good them be to the  people wey dem d lead so since our independence day till now. Em d always be from one hardship to another na wetin d see. Em go be like sae, as we d grow older as a country, naso our suffering d increase d go so. Em d unwise sae we be giant of Africa and we still d act like a puppet for the hands of the Western world. We can't lead the other African countries or live by a perfect example of how a nation that calls herself the giant of Africa should lead in terms development, utilizing of mineral resources, security, economy, rule of law, employment rate, industrialization and empowerment of her citizens. Nigeria as a country go better for all of us, na this kind story wey we d hear since we d small, and we d grow na still the same palava we still d encounter of how corrupt our leaders can be till date. This one come bring me to the question of when our country go grow come be able to act like a giant of Africa wey we be. Em be like sae our leaders no know sae this our country don grow old so. Them no suppose to the act this way give her citizens cos em d real sense a peso wey d born around 1960 don get grandchildren by now.

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: OP i dey also wish every body  for here HAPPY INDEPENDECE.But i get this question to ask according to waiting i read for punch news wey we need to look in as Nigerians, make we talk truthDo you think Nigeria has lived up to expectations, 63 years after it became independent?

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on October 01, 2023, 05:47:13 AMsnipHappy New Month to all and wish everyone well and also wish Nigeria a happy Independence Day day, this is supposed to be well celebrated but even looking at the challenges and the hardship people are going through, a prayer was said for the country and people are still hoping for the best. to some extent, I feel we were giving independence early and our politicians were eager to possess power just because of greed all this problem did not start today started during the military regime and the worst so far is democracy, they said is a government of the people and people are not giving the chance to show how they feel it clearly shows that things are not working. all we can do is wish for the best. men the hardship is increasing seriously.

comments.author: Chilwell
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on October 01, 2023, 02:03:54 PMThere is every reason to celebrate. I really agree with you because been alive to witness today as naija @63 is a moment  of joy, so many plan for see today but they did witness it, so we have heavy right to be happy. Quote from: Davidvictorson on October 01, 2023, 02:03:54 PMYou can still afford to have access to the internet. Meaning, there is not censorship. You have access to the outside world.You are also correct here, despite the naira rate against dollars we can still buy data comfortably with less than ₦1000, and the freedom of accessing every part of the world. Quote from: Davidvictorson on October 01, 2023, 02:03:54 PMWe are still better than some other countries where civil war is ongoing.Despite our suffering, naija is still a best place to live in, reason for my statement is that there is freedom, we move freely to any where we like. Is only those experiencing civil war can relate to this. Quote from: Davidvictorson on October 01, 2023, 02:03:54 PM You have access to electricity, good water, and food.Sorry sir, I disagree with you here because I don't see the electricity, good, and food you are talking about, I been they search for all you mentioned above but I couldn't find them, true be told we they suffer for all this you mentioned as if they are all imported, in this aspect our leaders has failed us, at this age we are still suffering. Quote from: Davidvictorson on October 01, 2023, 02:03:54 PMThe youths of the country are becoming politically conscious, aware, and are challenging the status quo.Because they are using us to enrich themselves, they approved a bill "not too young to rule" but the old once are pushing us away. When they called youth we know they are playing polites, so our awareness is still question because youth do not have even 30% say in naija polites. In this aspect they have failed. Quote from: Davidvictorson on October 01, 2023, 02:03:54 PM There's more ways to earn money other than waiting on the government to create jobs or even private companies for employment.We just have to force ourselves to survive because government do not care about us, countries with good leader also have companies and other ways of earn too. In Nigeria company works are still treated as slave, leaders do not show any concern about the wages they pay their citizens, in a company some will work for 12 hours and end up getting ₦1500 not even up $2. Please are they been fair. Quote from: Davidvictorson on October 01, 2023, 02:03:54 PMThere is hope.We shouldn't give up, each an every citizens should serve as good ambassador of the country, we don't have the opportunity today but tomorrow by God's grace we will make a difference, we should all have this at the back of our mind.

comments.author: Forever101
comments.body: 100% reason to appreciate the state of Nigeria as it call for revolution and awakening to reality. All the advance countries in the world today are older than Nigeria, they have gone through series of hard and bad time. The lurk we have in Nigeria now, is that we are in technology age where we can easily hit transformations and live a better life which I believe can happen befor the next independence. It took many years 4 advance country to cross to where they are today. In one of my post on this local board, I wrote say make we wise up for Africa, make we collect our full dominion because we still dey under the slavery of the people wey say Dem don live us, this one wey we dey celebrate so that the one wey be say Dem no dey over us directly. If Dem steal money for naija, no be oyinbo country Dem carry Dem go, take build companies for them?. Thank God say we gain independence but make we dey free from their mental and economy slavery wey waga us with better hunger.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Nah good thing you tok for here and the question you ask nah the same one every naija person dey ask but make I ask you, you get any reason to celebrate as a Nigerian? If you no get me I get..e no sopoz excite you say even if we dey corrupt, we no dey get much natural disasters? Naija nah contri wey get intelligent, hard working people wey like to represent. See eh, sometimes we dey put the bad tins wey dey happen for naija sotey we come dey overlook the good tins God don bless us with. If some of us dey para say nah independence day, nah to turn am to new month na.

comments.author: Kara3
comments.body: My fellow country people I greet ona oo, to me our leaders don fall our handicap I swr, 63yrs no be 63days oo, how we go suffer like dis wen we get everything, as dis country big so, no refinery upon all the crude oil we dy export, go market na, you go cry for how tins take cost, people wey get battalion of children nai I dy pity pass, because if dem been know say na so e go be, dem for behave dem self,To me na just life and sound health I dy celebrate oo

comments.author: gotzekrul
comments.body: Nothing de here to celebrate jare, tinz just hard for this kantry, make dem.I nearly slap person weh wish me happy independence, him get luck say e no near me wen he talk dat tin..My eyes de red here

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Even though the country hard, reason still dey to celebrate. The fact say we never dey fight war na enough reason to celebrate this independence. Yes our leaders no dey try but at least we never turn refugee for our own land. We dey see how nations way dey suffer terrorist attacks dey be, it’s not nice at all. At least we no dey live in fear say bomb go explode for your house or workplace anytime.
